title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.18 - Consolidation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.18 - Consolidation

State Regulations

If common questions of law and fact are involved, the
commissioner may, in his or her sole discretion and at any stage of the
proceedings, consolidate two or more appeals for the submission of pleadings
and other papers and/or the issuance of a decision. In such case, the
commissioner may permit or require the service and filing of pleadings, affidavits, memoranda of law and any other papers required or authorized to be
served pursuant to this Part and Part 276 of this Title upon such terms as the
commissioner may specify. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8

275.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
